summary: This mod introduces Imago Volar, a Dremora companion to Skyrim. You can find him acting as a bouncer at the New Gnisis Corner Club in Windhelm. He comes equipped with a set of Hardened Falmer Armor and a unique dwarven greatsword.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Imago Volar, Dremora Follower

[/size][/color][/font][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]This mod introduces Imago Volar, a Dremora companion to Skyrim. You can find him acting as a bouncer at the New Gnisis Corner Club in Windhelm. He comes equipped with a set of Hardened Falmer Armor and a unique daedric greatsword.

[/size][/color][/font][i][size=4]1.2 UPDATE Imago Volar is now completely standalone (aside from the requisite DLC), and the files are now conveniently packaged into .bsa format. Ran through Tes5Edit and playtested! [/size][/i][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]
[/size]

[size=4]Please refer to the 'instructions' readme and the required mods section to find out what you will need for this mod to work. [/size][/color][/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Features:[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Marriageable [/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Lightfoot (will not set off traps)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Essential (cannot be killed)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Uniquely enchanted weapon & armor[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Expert heavy armor & weapons[/size][/color][/font]
[/list]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Changes[/size][/color][/font]

[font=Times New Roman][size=4]In order to make Imago an effective follower, I made a few slight tweaks to the Dremora Race in the CK. I toggled the "head-tracking", so that he (along with any other Dremora follower) will pay attention to you and not stare off into space I also unlocked blond hair for all Dremora. Lastly I went through and personally checked the armors in the CK so that the Dremora race can wear them (Daedric, Ebony and a very few others were the only ones allowed to be worn by Dremora). 

[/size][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Credits[/size][/color][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Big thanks goes to

[/size][/color][/font][list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66630]Lokels [/url]﻿for Loks Eyes Standalone[/size][/font]
[/list]
author: AedanStarfang
